name: Mercs
description: Assemble a team of mercenaries and challenge the computer or another player in a quick turn-based battle. Unlock new mercs, find the best skill combos, and watch your adorable tiny soldiers blow themselves up in a variety of hex-mapped, low-poly environments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card with DX11 feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2500 CPU @ 3.30 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
